welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ormond Beach, a charming coastal city known for its stunning beaches, rich history, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to discover all the beauty and excitement this city has to offer. Enjoy your time here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Daytona Beach International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Daytona Beach International Airport serves low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bunnell Flagler County Airport is a small but modern facility, offering a comfortable and convenient travel experience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Bunnell Flagler County Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers, providing exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Smyrna Beach Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at New Smyrna Beach Municipal Airport serves as a hub for private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
